home.component.marketingMsg1: Thank you for registering. I am a fellow RV-er developing this web app as a way to connect people that do the RV lifestyle like you do. Your email has been added to an email list so I can keep you informed of progress.
home.component.marketingMsg2: To get started, please fill out your
home.component.marketingMsg4: Things to come: home page will give ideas of who else is out there like you. There will also be  is a 'newbie corner', custom forums, messaging, etc.
home.component.progressBar0: To get started, fill out your profile!
home.component.progressBar5: Fill out your profile for best results!
home.component.progressBar40: Almost half way there! Complete profile.
home.component.progressBar75: Great job fillout out your profile!
home.component.earlyAdopter: Thanks for being an early adopter!
home.component.expert1: We were all newbie RVers at one time and somewhere along the line an experienced RVer helped us out. Click
home.component.expert3: to see how you might help

profile.component.explanation: Please enter information about you and how you RV to help us give you more relavant information and answers to your questions.
profile.component.viewpic: View your story as others will see it

personal.component.explanation: This information will be used to find information that is relavant to the way you RV.  The more complete, the better your results!
personal.component.help: Click on any help icon for information on how the data point will be used for you.
personal.component.helpName: Used for communication between RVLikeMe.com and you
personal.component.helpDisplayName: Your 'name' as shown to other users.  This could be your real name or a 'handle'.
personal.component.helpEmail: Your user name for signing in and for communications from RVLikeMe.com
personal.component.helpYearOfBirth: Used to enable you to find people near your age group and will not be displayed to other users.
personal.component.helpGender: Used to help you find others with the same gender
personal.component.helpHomeCountry: Used to find other users that share your country of origin or domicile
personal.component.helpHomeState: Used to find other users that share your state of origin or domicile
personal.component.helpMyStory: Shown to others who are interested in your story

lifestyle.component.explanation: This information will be used to find information that is relavant to the way you RV.  The more complete, the better your results!
lifestyle.component.helpRvUse: Used to make interactions more relavant
lifestyle.component.helpWorklife: Used to make interactions more relavant
lifestyle.component.helpBoondocking: Used to make interactions more relavant
lifestyle.component.helpTraveling: Used to make interactions more relavant
lifestyle.component.travelingDesc: How I travel in my RV
lifestyle.component.uploadpics: Upload 3 pics about your RV Lifestyle

rig.component.explanation: This information will be used to others with similar rigs for more relavant answers.  The more complete, the better your results!
rig.component.uploadpics: Upload up to 3 pics of your rig

interests.component.explanation: This information will be used to help find others that share your interests.  Please check all that you are interested in.
